SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, X.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT bk.book_no, bk.book_name, bk.book_cover, bk.book_date, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname FROM book bk INNER JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = bk.mem_no INNER JOIN board bd ON m.mem_no = bd.mem_no AND bk.book_no = bd.book_no WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(bk.book_name,#{q}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(m.mem_nickname,#{q}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(bo_title,#{q}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(bo_cont,#{q}) AND m.mem_state = 0 AND bo_lock=1 GROUP BY bk.book_no, bk.book_name, bk.book_cover, bk.book_date, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname) ORDER BY REGEXP_COUNT(book_name,#{q}) DESC, REGEXP_COUNT(mem_nickname,#{q}) DESC)X) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{n}+1) AND (#{n}+6)
